participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and artistic with a passion for learning new skills.
participant_1.background: I am learning how to play the piano. I am the youngest sibling of four. I geocache in my spare time. I am a school psychologist. Chocolate is my favorite food.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and easy-going, always looking for fun experiences.
participant_2.background: I love the snow. I like to surf every chance I get. I work graveyard in a hotel. I'm saving for college. My favorite actor is Robert De Niro.

content.text: Hi! What do you do for fun?
I like to surf, snow ski, and I also like to play video games.
That's great! I like to surf too. I'm learning how to play the piano.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to play an instrument.
It's a lot of fun. I've been playing for a few months now and I'm still getting the hang of it.
That's great! I hope you keep it up.
Thanks! I'm trying to. I also like to go geocaching in my spare time.
Geocaching? What's that?
It's a type of treasure hunt where you use GPS coordinates to find hidden containers.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never heard of it before.
It is! I've found a few containers so far and it's always a lot of fun.
Well, I'm glad you enjoy it. I'm not sure I'm that adventurous.
That's okay! There's plenty of other fun things to do.
Like what?
Well, I like to go skiing and snowboarding in the winter. I also like to play video games.
I like skiing and snowboarding too! I don't play video games much, though.
That's okay! There's something for everyone.
I guess so. Well, I'm glad we met.
Me too! It was nice talking to you.
You too.
